org.fujion.component

Class BaseInputboxComponent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseUIComponent
        • org.fujion.component.BaseInputComponent<T>
          • org.fujion.component.BaseInputboxComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value type for the input box.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisable, IElementIdentifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseNumberboxComponent, BasePickerComponent, Combobox, Datebox, Memobox, Textbox, Timebox

    public abstract class BaseInputboxComponent<T>
extends BaseInputComponent<T>
    The base class for all input box components.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseInputboxComponent

        public BaseInputboxComponent()

    • Method Detail

      • getSynchronized

        protected boolean getSynchronized()
        Returns the synchronization flag. A true value means that the client will notify the server as the value of the input box changes. A false value means that the client will notify the server of the new value only when the input element loses focus.
        Returns:
        The synchronization flag.

      • setSynchronized

        protected void setSynchronized(boolean synchronize)
        Sets the synchronization flag. A true value means that the client will notify the server as the value of the input box changes. A false value means that the client will notify the server of the new value only when the input element loses focus.
        Parameters:
        synchronize - The synchronization flag.

      • getMinValue

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="minvalue")
public T getMinValue()
        Returns the minimum allowable value, if any.
        Returns:
        The minimum allowable value. Null indicates no minimum.

      • setMinValue

        public void setMinValue(T minvalue)
        Sets the minimum allowable value.
        Parameters:
        minvalue - The minimum allowable value. Null indicates no minimum.

public boolean isReadonly()

        Returns:
        True if the input box is read-only.

      • setReadonly

        @Component.PropertySetter(value="readonly")
public void setReadonly(boolean readonly)
        Sets the read-only state of the input box.
        Parameters:
        readonly - If true, the contents of the input box may not be changed by the user.

      • isRequired

        @Component.PropertyGetter(value="required")
public boolean isRequired()

        True if input is required for this component.

public void setRequired(boolean required)
